synopsis.text:
Fuu, Umi, and Hikaru are three inseparable friends, but destiny has other plans as their world is suddenly plunged into darkness by the malevolent forces of Cephiro. As the once-thriving Tokyo transforms into a desolate wasteland, the friends find themselves as humanity's last hope.

The sinister castle of Cephiro, led by the ruthless Eagle, seeks to destroy Earth, and only the girls' newfound mystical powers can stop them. Granting them the ability to merge with divine beings known as Mashin, these creatures transform the friends into formidable warriors with incredible destructive capabilities.

As Alcyone, the vengeful ice-witch, pursues Hikaru, the brave Lantis intervenes, trapping her within a magical labyrinth to test her powers. Meanwhile, Fuu and Umi traverse the eerie cityscape, searching for the slumbering Mashin.

With the planet's fate hanging in the balance and Cephiro's warlocks closing in, the young Magic Knights must confront their fears and embrace their newfound abilities. Will the Mashin be enough to save them from the clutches of Cephiro's evil? Only time will tell, as the girls embark on a perilous journey to protect their world and preserve their unbreakable bond.
